ai-tha-ap133:1.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap133:2.3_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap133:2.4_0: I myself was the one community
ai-tha-ap133:3.3_0: Those who stand in accordance with the proper conduct,
ai-tha-ap133:3.4_0: they don’t give rise to the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap133:4.2_0: The Buddha was the compassionate side of the hermits.
ai-tha-ap133:4.3_0: sat down on the Community of monks.
ai-tha-ap133:5.2_0: In the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap133:5.4_0: He won’t go to a bad place.
ai-tha-ap133:6.3_0: the one named sought by name,
ai-tha-ap133:6.4_0: he will be a disciple of the Teacher.’
ai-tha-ap133:8.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap133:9.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap133:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sobhita.
ai-tha-ap133:11.1_0: he explained the first propagation of Dhamma.
